articles.author: Moneycontrol
articles.title: 10 Common Plants That Attract Snakes To Your House - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Check out the list of top 10 common plants that attract snakes to your houses.
articles.content: Hostas provide dense, shady areas that can be attractive to small creatures seeking shelter. These creatures, such as insects and rodents, can attract snakes looking for food or a place to hide.
